name: The Carnage Club (Demo 3)
description:
The Carnage Club is the game I've been working on for over a year now! The first two demos are still on itch.io, but here's a third that provides a look at a piece of the over-world, enemies, and bosses. It includes music and sound effects too. This is just a small section that appears very early in the game. Please comment down below if you see a bug or just have a suggestion of any kind. Thanks for playing!

Controls for Menu:

J to select    A&D to move

Controls for Overworld:

WASD to move    J to select    E to open Book    Arrow Keys to Turn Pages

Controls for Levels:

WASD to move, jump, and shield     J to attack    K to dodge    R to return to menu
